alert.note: Alert for Upper Bucks; Western Chester; Western Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 8:33AM EST until December 22 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations of up to a half inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Western Chester, Western Montgomery and Upper Bucks. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief period of snow, sleet, and freezing rain this morning will change to all rain by midday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper Bucks; Western Chester; Western Montgomery
